name: Project Buoyancy [Prototype]
description:
- You, your boat and a corridor of obstacles ahead -

. . .

An early Prototype of a personal Game Concept.

Feel free to leave me any feedback, bug-report, feature-request and whatnot!

PLAY IT AT MILLERNTOR GALLERY

This game is currently available to play in the Gaming Corner at the Millerntor Gallery until 26.06.2022 (Hamburg, Germany).
If you're around be sure to stop by ^_^
